answers.answer: I actually am going through the same thing. I'm due Feb 27th but baby and belly measure more like Feb 8th. The ultrasound showed he was already 4lbs 10oz. My doctor will not change my due date though and I'm already having a csection. He said he'll watch his weight closely and if he's getting too big or I'm showing signs of preeclampsia again he will schedule the surgery. I had my 2nd daughter via csection 6 years ago and actually preferred that over my previous vaginal delivery. Good luck to you...maybe we'll just have big healthy babies

question: I went to get an ultrasound done today and im supose to be 31weeks and 2 days today. But my baby is measuring what esver the due date ofcfeb 7 th would be i think 33 and 6 days . And he weighs 5lbs already?! Im so scared that ill have a huge baby , my due date is supose to be feb 25 but ive had 2 others earlier in this pregnancy. My daughter went to 40weeks and i was induced she weighed 7lbs 7oz does my due date change what if he is a big baby will i be induce. .c section.. has anyone experienced this or know of it .. please comment to ease my mind. .
title: size and age of baby and due date please  read
